thread.title: Lesley Sharon Naylor
thread.title_full: CarTrawler reviewed by Lesley Sharon Naylor

author: Lesley Sharon Naylor
title: Lesley Sharon Naylor
text: Didn't want to drive over 400 miles and waste the day so we flew with Ryanair into Glasgow. Hired a car from there and spent an absolutely fantastic 4 days in the Highlands. Picking up the car was stress free and the staff were very friendly and knowledgeable. Highly recommend them. Our only issue was that the signage to the Drop off point on return to the airport (Glasgow) left a lot to be desired. This was mainly due to the construction and road works being carried out there.
